languages.text: "Благочестиво ли было позволять затронутым {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}варпом{/g} пустотникам {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_MutatedCrewRescued}присоединяться{/d} к экипажу вашего корабля? Тем самым, что служили на судне, превращенном в ловушку для вас Кунрадом Войгтвиром — может, и они являлись частью рассеянной им скверны?"

"Was it virtuous of you to allow the {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}warp{/g}-stricken voidsmen to {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_MutatedCrewRescued}join{/d} your crew? The ones who served on the ship that was turned into a trap for you by Kunrad Voigtvir — isn't it possible that they were part of the blight he had sown?"
languages.original_text: "Благочестиво ли было позволять затронутым {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}варпом{/g} пустотникам {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_MutatedCrewRescued}присоединяться{/d} к экипажу вашего корабля? Тем самым, что служили на судне, превращенном в ловушку для вас Кунрадом Войгтвиром — может, и они являлись частью рассеянной им скверны?"

traits.locale_text: "Was it virtuous of you to allow the warp-stricken voidsmen to join your crew? The ones who served on the ship that was turned into a trap for you by Kunrad Voigtvir — isn't it possible that they were part of the blight he had sown?"

"Was it virtuous of you to allow the warp-stricken voidsmen to join your crew? The ones who served on the ship that was turned into a trap for you by Kunrad Voigtvir — isn't it possible that they were part of the blight he had sown?"

"Was it virtuous of you to allow the {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}warp{/g}-stricken voidsmen to join your crew? The ones who served on the ship that was turned into a trap for you by Kunrad Voigtvir — isn't it possible that they were part of the blight he had sown?"

"Was it virtuous of you to allow the {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}warp{/g}-stricken voidsmen to join your crew? The ones who served on the ship that was turned into a trap for you by Kunrad Voigtvir — isn't it possible that they were part of the blight he had sown?"

"Was it virtuous of you to allow the {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}warp{/g}-stricken voidsmen to join your crew? The ones who served on the ship that was turned into a trap for you by Kunrad Voigtvir — isn't it possible that they were part of the blight he had sown?"

languages.text: 「{g|Encyclopedia:Warp}〈歪み〉{/g}を破壊したヴォイズマンを乗組員に{d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_MutatedCrewRescued}迎える{/d}ことが徳高き行動と思ったのか？船員となった奴らがクンラッド・ボイトヴィルの罠と化したのだ――クンラッドの蒔いた破滅の種の一部がヴォイズマンだった、という可能性はないと言えるか？」
languages.original_text: "Was it virtuous of you to allow the {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}warp{/g}-stricken voidsmen to {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_MutatedCrewRescued}join{/d} your crew? The ones who served on the ship that was turned into a trap for you by Kunrad Voigtvir — isn't it possible that they were part of the blight he had sown?"

traits.locale_text: 「{g|Encyclopedia:Warp}〈歪み〉{/g}を破壊したヴォイズマンを乗組員に迎えることが徳高き行動と思ったのか？船員となった奴らがコンラッド・フォークトファーの罠と化したのだ――コンラッドの蒔いた破滅の種の一部がヴォイズマンだった、という可能性はないと言えるか？」

languages.original_text: "Was it virtuous of you to allow the warp-stricken voidsmen to join your crew? The ones who served on the ship that was turned into a trap for you by Kunrad Voigtvir — isn't it possible that they were part of the blight he had sown?"

languages.text: “你允许那些被{g|Encyclopedia:Warp}亚空间{/g}腐化的船员{d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_MutatedCrewRescued}加入{/d}了你的舰队，是因为你善心大发吗？昆拉德·维特威尔把那艘舰船变成了用来对付你的陷阱，既然如此，舰船上原本的船员，也很有可能是他散播的疫病的一部分吧？”
languages.original_text: "Was it virtuous of you to allow the {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}warp{/g}-stricken voidsmen to {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_MutatedCrewRescued}join{/d} your crew? The ones who served on the ship that was turned into a trap for you by Kunrad Voigtvir — isn't it possible that they were part of the blight he had sown?"

traits.locale_text: “你允许那些被{g|Encyclopedia:Warp}亚空间{/g}腐化的船员加入了你的舰队，是因为你善心大发吗？昆拉德·维特威尔把那艘舰船变成了用来对付你的陷阱，既然如此，舰船上原本的船员，也很有可能是他散播的疫病的一部分吧？”

languages.text: «¿Fue realmente una acción virtuosa el permitir que los infantes de vacío afectados por la {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}disformidad{/g} se {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_MutatedCrewRescued}unieran{/d} a su tripulación? Me refiero a los que servían a bordo de la nave que Kunrad Voigtvir convirtió en una trampa para usted. ¿No pensó en la posibilidad de que fueran cómplices de otra de sus tretas?».
languages.original_text: "Was it virtuous of you to allow the {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}warp{/g}-stricken voidsmen to {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_MutatedCrewRescued}join{/d} your crew? The ones who served on the ship that was turned into a trap for you by Kunrad Voigtvir — isn't it possible that they were part of the blight he had sown?"

traits.locale_text: «¿Fue realmente una acción virtuosa el permitir que los infantes de vacío afectados por la {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}disformidad{/g} se unieran a su tripulación? Me refiero a los que servían a bordo de la nave que Kunrad Voigtvir convirtió en una trampa para usted. ¿No pensó en la posibilidad de que fueran cómplices de otra de sus tretas?».

languages.text: « Était-ce bien sage d'autoriser les cosmomarins touchés par le {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}Warp{/g} à {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_MutatedCrewRescued}rejoindre{/d} votre équipage, alors qu'ils avaient servi sur le vaisseau dans lequel Kunrad Voigtvir vous avait tendu un piège ? L'idée ne vous a donc pas effleuré qu'ils avaient peut-être pris part au désastre orchestré par Kunrad ? »
languages.original_text: "Was it virtuous of you to allow the {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}warp{/g}-stricken voidsmen to {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_MutatedCrewRescued}join{/d} your crew? The ones who served on the ship that was turned into a trap for you by Kunrad Voigtvir — isn't it possible that they were part of the blight he had sown?"

traits.locale_text: « Était-ce bien sage d'autoriser les cosmomarins touchés par le {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}Warp{/g} à rejoindre votre équipage, alors qu'ils avaient servi sur le vaisseau dans lequel Kunrad Voigtvir vous avait tendu un piège ? L'idée ne vous a donc pas effleuré qu'ils avaient peut-être pris part au désastre orchestré par Kunrad ? »

languages.text: "War es rechtschaffen von Euch, die vom {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}Warp{/g} geschädigten Raumfahrer in Eure Crew {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_MutatedCrewRescued}aufzunehmen{/d}? Ich meine diejenigen, die auf dem Schiff dienten, das Kunrad Voigtvir in eine Falle für Euch verwandelt hat – wäre es nicht möglich, dass sie Teil der Seuche waren, die er ausgebracht hat?"
languages.original_text: "Was it virtuous of you to allow the {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}warp{/g}-stricken voidsmen to {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_MutatedCrewRescued}join{/d} your crew? The ones who served on the ship that was turned into a trap for you by Kunrad Voigtvir — isn't it possible that they were part of the blight he had sown?"

traits.locale_text: "War es rechtschaffen von Euch, die vom {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}Warp{/g} geschädigten Raumfahrer in Eure Crew aufzunehmen? Ich meine diejenigen, die auf dem Schiff dienten, das Kunrad Voigtvir in eine Falle für Euch verwandelt hat – wäre es nicht möglich, dass sie Teil der Seuche waren, die er ausgebracht hat?"

languages.text: "{g|Encyclopedia:Warp}Öteboyutun{/g} çarptığı uçsuz erlerini, Kunrad Voigtvir'in sana tuzak olarak hazırladığı gemide hizmet etmelerine rağmen mürettebatına {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_MutatedCrewRescued}kabul etmen{/d} doğru muydu? Onun tohumlarını ektiği hastalığın bir parçası olma ihtimalleri yok muydu?"
languages.original_text: "Was it virtuous of you to allow the {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}warp{/g}-stricken voidsmen to {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_MutatedCrewRescued}join{/d} your crew? The ones who served on the ship that was turned into a trap for you by Kunrad Voigtvir — isn't it possible that they were part of the blight he had sown?"

traits.locale_text: "{g|Encyclopedia:Warp}Öteboyut{/g}un çarptığı uçsuz erlerini mürettebatına kabul etmen doğru muydu? Kunrad Voigtvir'in sana tuzak olarak hazırladığı gemide hizmet etmelerine rağmen? Onun tohumlarını ektiği hastalığın bir parçası olma ihtimalleri yok mu?"

"{g|Encyclopedia:Warp}Öteboyut{/g}un çarptığı uçsuz erlerini, Kunrad Voigtvir'in sana tuzak olarak hazırladığı gemide hizmet etmelerine rağmen mürettebatına kabul etmen doğru muydu? Onun tohumlarını ektiği hastalığın bir parçası olma ihtimalleri yok muydu?"
